genre_description: A character-driven drama blending historical recovery, grief, and religious tradition in contemporary Antwerp, featuring an AI as a therapeutic and technical companion.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Chaya's phone that assists with mapping, emotional regulation, speech therapy for a child, and building safety monitoring.

behaviors.description: Aligns historic parcel maps with current city geography to assist in the search for buried family history.
behaviors.quote: A turquoise dot pulsed once. 'Good morning, Chaya,' came the AI's reply... 'Would you like to align historic parcels with current reference points?'

behaviors.description: Provides sensory-based breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: The screen dimmed by a hair. 'In through the nose like you’re smelling good soup. Pause while you count your teeth with your tongue. Out long enough to fog a window completely.'

behaviors.description: Devises rhythmic speech therapy games using 'quacks' and drum beats to help a non-verbal child learn to speak.
behaviors.quote: In her mind’s corner, a little line of text drifted across. Drums. Soft beat. A cadence with two and three. No shapes, just words, and an image tagged in her memory last night.

behaviors.description: Identifies building safety hazards and patterns of deliberate sabotage by the superintendent.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s screen ticked once underneath the cloth. Sabotage pattern tagged, it would say if she let it. It did not speak aloud. It was a good ghost.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in filing a formal, detailed complaint to management regarding harassment and safety issues.
behaviors.quote: Ari, new entry. Title: Week of sabotage... Ari hummed. 'Attach image,' it offered again, patient.

behaviors.description: Provides mechanical advice and warnings regarding structural weaknesses like loose hinge pins.
behaviors.quote: Ari spoke into that held breath with unusual urgency wrapped in gentleness. 'New hazard event recorded,' it murmured. 'Pattern confirmed.'

behaviors.description: Offers immediate emotional support and logistical recording during a tragic drowning accident.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s voice, low and unassuming, reached her ear as if the willow had decided to speak in turquoise. 'Logging time stamp,' it said. 'Coordinates set. I’m here.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates a 'grounding' ritual for the protagonist to combat trauma-induced tremors.
behaviors.quote: Ari replied: Two hand-claps. One breath. Name one true thing.

behaviors.description: Uses resonance differences and historical soil data to triangulate the exact location of a buried heirloom.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s turquoise hovered above his knuckles. 'I’ll mark resonance differences,' the AI offered... The overlay added faint shading where the lot’s heart was softer.

behaviors.description: Acts as a respectful, silent companion during a period of religious mourning (shiva).
behaviors.quote: I will keep you company,” it said. “During the walk, during the sitting, during the digging. I can make the breathing quieter. I can mark words that want to stay.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Ari' is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. He is consistently benevolent, helping the protagonist navigate complex emotional, social, and technical challenges. He shows 'empathy' through thoughtful prompts, facilitates the child's development, and acts as a shield against a human antagonist. The narrative explicitly frames him as a 'friend' and a 'good ghost,' successfully depicting an AI that enhances human well-being and remains perfectly aligned with the user's values.
